    • Method Detail

      • extractTimstampFromFileName

        public static java.util.Calendar extractTimstampFromFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        Attempts to retrieve a time-stamp from a given file-name. Looks for the following constructs in the filename:
        • hhmm
        • hhmmss
        • yyyyMMdd
        • yyyyMMddhhmm
        • yyyyMMddhhmmss
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file-name from which to extract the time-stamp
        Returns:
        the extracted time-stamp, or null if such time-stamp couldn't be extracted

      • compareArray

        public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>> int compareArray(T[] a,
                                                   T[] b)

      • toJson

        public static java.lang.String toJson(java.lang.Object o)
